name: Obus
description:
In a time when traditional customs and tales of the old are no longer needed, how will a young Bidayuh girl find her way home?

Escape the spiritual realm with the aid of Tikuwan, the guardian Hornbill, and learn the Bidayuh's symbols and folklore!

A prototype to fulfil the requirements of a capstone project. You can play on the Web browser or download the standalone file to play!

NOTE: Standalone is available for Windows only and does not require Internet connection.
